source.ef733ef7:
import nltk
nltk.download('punkt')
word_data=("The Indian Premier League is a professional Twenty20 cricket league in India contested during March or April and May of every year by eight teams representing eight different cities or states in India. The league was founded by the Board of Control for Cricket in India in 2008")
nltk_tokens=nltk.word_tokenize(word_data)
print(nltk_tokens)
source.8c326735:
import nltk
nltk.download("punkt")

sentence_data=("God is Great! I won a lottery.")
nltk_tokens=nltk.sent_tokenize(sentence_data)
print(nltk_tokens)
